title: Force Format/Analyser on obfuscated/anti-disassembly file
content:
I have a clear .class file, which is likely obfuscated. However, Ghidra is not detecting it as Java, and shows it as Raw binary, which prevents me from using the Java Class Analyzer on the file.

How can I force Ghidra to identify the file as Java class file or to show me the Java Class Analyzer?

comments.text: Hmm, good question, I wonder if that might have anything to do with the format of .class file Ghidra is expecting
